text: ai nabee! jab tumhaare paas eemaanavaalee striyaan aakar tumase isapar baiat kare ki ve allaah ke saath kisee cheez ko saajhee nahin thaharaengee aur na choree karengee aur na vyabhichaar karengee, aur na apanee aulaad kee hatya karengee aur na apane haathon aur pairon ko beech koee aarop ghadakar laengee. aur na kisee bhale kaam mein tumhaaree avagya karengee, to unase baiat le lo aur unake lie allaah se kshama kee praarthana karo. nishchay hee atyant bahut kshamaasheel, atyant dayaavaan hai
